data.Question: સાઇનસોઇડલ વોલ્ટેજનું આરએમએસ મૂલ્ય શું છે જો પીક મૂલ્ય Vp હોય?
data.Explaination: સાઇન વેવનું આરએમએસ મૂલ્ય = Vp/√2

data.Question: એંગ્યુલર ફ્રીક્વન્સી ω પર ઇન્ડક્ટર L નો રિએક્ટન્સ શું છે?
data.Explaination: ઇન્ડક્ટિવ રિએક્ટન્સ XL = ωL

data.Question: એંગ્યુલર ફ્રીક્વન્સી ω પર કેપેસિટર C નો રિએક્ટન્સ શું છે?
data.Explaination: કેપેસિટિવ રિએક્ટન્સ XC = 1/(ωC)

data.Question: શુદ્ધ રેઝિસ્ટિવ એસી સર્કિટમાં વોલ્ટેજ અને કરંટ કેવી રીતે હોય છે?
data.Explaination: રેઝિસ્ટર કોઈ ફેઝ શિફ્ટ કરતું નથી; વોલ્ટેજ અને કરંટ એક જ ફેઝમાં હોય છે

data.Question: જે સર્કિટમાં કરંટ વોલ્ટેજ કરતા પાછળ રહે છે તેનો પાવર ફેક્ટર શું દર્શાવે છે?
data.Explaination: લેગિંગ કરંટ ઇન્ડક્ટિવ લોડ દર્શાવે છે

data.Question: એપેરેંટ પાવર S (VA માં) કેટલું છે?
data.Explaination: એપેરેંટ પાવર S = Vrms × Irms

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Real power P (in watts) equals:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: P = S cosφ where cosφ is power factor

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In a series RLC circuit at resonance, impedance is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: At resonance XL = XC so impedance = R (minimum)

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Resonant frequency of a series RLC circuit ω0 is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: ω0 = 1/√(LC)

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Quality factor Q of a series RLC is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: For series RLC, Q = ω0L / R

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In a parallel RLC at resonance, the circuit is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Parallel resonance gives high impedance

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: The total impedance of resistor R and inductor L in series is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Series impedance Z = R + jXL = R + jωL

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Phase angle φ between voltage and current in R-L series is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Phase = arctan((XL - XC)/R); for R-L, φ = arctan(XL/R)

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: For a purely capacitive circuit, current relative to voltage is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Capacitor causes current to lead voltage by 90°

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Impedance of a capacitor is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Zc = 1/(jωC) which equals -j/(ωC)

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: If power factor is 0.8 lagging and apparent power is 100 VA, real power is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: P = S × pf = 100 × 0.8 = 80 W

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: The average power absorbed by an ideal capacitor over one cycle is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Ideal reactive elements (C,L) absorb zero average power

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In AC steady state, phasor representation uses:
data.B: Complex numbers representing magnitude and phase
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Phasors represent magnitude and phase as complex numbers

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Which quantity is frequency dependent in AC circuits?
data.D: Resistivity of copper at constant temp
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Reactance depends on frequency

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Transformer transfers power by:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Transformers use magnetic coupling between windings

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Turns ratio n = Np/Ns of an ideal transformer relates voltages as:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Voltage ratio equals turns ratio

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In a step-up transformer, secondary voltage is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Step-up increases secondary voltage

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Leakage reactance in transformer causes:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Leakage reactance reduces coupling and affects voltage regulation

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Skin effect in conductors causes effective resistance to:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Skin effect confines current to surface, increasing resistance at high freq

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: What is the unit of susceptance?
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Susceptance is the imaginary part of admittance, unit Siemens

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In a single-phase AC, maximum instantaneous power equals:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Instantaneous power varies with time; peak involves cos(2ωt) term

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Current in a series circuit is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Series current is common

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: Voltage across components in parallel is:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Parallel branches share same voltage

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: A wattless circuit has power factor:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: Wattless means no real power, PF = 0

data.Question: પ્રશ્ન: In an R-L series circuit, as frequency increases, the impedance:
data.Explaination: સમજાવટ: XL increases with ω so Z increases
